lines.text:
Oh look, it's the blue tamagotchi
cat of wisdom.

Look there isn't enough space to
fit that in the name box and I feel
awkward just calling you blue cat
so pick a name.

Sure why the hell not?

Take it away... Susan.

As you've probably noticed walking
around outside there's quite a
strong paralax effect going on.

Currently, there is 8 layers
implemented and those layers
change speed depending on
z-axis affiliation.

On an artistic note, Madeline
would like to let you know the
imagery is based on a watershed
she used to hike in BC.

It featured lots of abandoned
infrustructure, maze like paths,
and the smell of ocean air.
Why would you even bring that up?

Because if I don't she said she'd
delete m-
